price: Wọ́n sọ pé: “Mímọ́ ni fún Ọ, kò sí ìmọ̀ kan fún wa àyàfi ohun tí O fi mọ̀ wá. Dájúdájú Ìwọ, Ìwọ ni Onímọ̀, Ọlọ́gbọ́n.”
arabic: قَالُواْ سُبۡحَٰنَكَ لَا عِلۡمَ لَنَآ إِلَّا مَا عَلَّمۡتَنَآۖ إِنَّكَ أَنتَ ٱلۡعَلِيمُ ٱلۡحَكِيمُ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: qālū sub'ḥānaka lā ʿil'ma lanā illā mā ʿallamtanā innaka anta al-ʿalīmu al-ḥakīmu
